Moreover, the Vinaya and Karman of the Lesser Vehicle are six parts in ten fascicles. However, they are all compiled with evidence and were widely practiced in the times. They are supplemented and included.

Moreover, the compilations and biographies written in this land are forty parts in three hundred and sixty-eight fascicles. However, they all supplement the correct teachings, so they are supplemented and included in the catalog.
